issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The following error can be logged (cloud-error.log) when terminating instances:

{code}
Wed Oct 7 17:30:41 2015 ERROR [ActivityManager:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#834] [com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager
.transitionToDeregistered(ActivityManager.java):1009] com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AutoScalingMetadataException: Failed to find auto scaling instances by example: [AutoScalingInstance availabilityZone=nul
l healthStatus=null autoScalingGroup=null autoScalingGroupName=euca-internal-elb-000141698773-full-tes-elbprivat-GPDXHSU2S9VTG-one launc
hConfigurationName=null lifecycleState=null inServiceTimestamp=null configurationState=Registered registrationAttempts=null displayName=null ownerAccountNumber=000858663286 uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]

        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AbstractOwnedPersistents.metadataException(AbstractOwnedPersistents.java:80)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AbstractOwnedPersistents.metadataException(AbstractOwnedPersistents.java:33)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.listByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:128)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.instances.PersistenceAutoScalingInstances$4.doWork(PersistenceAutoScalingInstances.java:287)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.instances.PersistenceAutoScalingInstances$4.doWork(PersistenceAutoScalingInstances.java:284)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AbstractOwnedPersistents$1.apply(AbstractOwnedPersistents.java:50)

        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TransactionalFunction.apply(Entities.java:1354)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.metadata.AbstractOwnedPersistents.transactionWithRetry(AbstractOwnedPersistents.java:58)

        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager.perhapsTerminateInstances(ActivityManager.java:713)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager.perhapsScale(ActivityManager.java:768)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager.scalingActivities(ActivityManager.java:485)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager.access$200(ActivityManager.java:191)
        at com.eucalyptus.autoscaling.activities.ActivityManager$3.doWork(ActivityManager.java:227)

        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)

Caused by: org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: could not extract ResultSet
        at org.hibernate.exception.internal.SQLStateConversionDelegate.convert(SQLStateConversionDelegate.java:123)

        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.listByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:126)
        ... 24 more
Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: syntax error at or near ")"
  Position: 3453
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2161)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1890)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:255)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.execute(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:560)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeWithFlags(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:417)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeQuery(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:302)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor107.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)

        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.invoke(ProxyStatement.java:100)
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.intercept(ProxyStatement.java:57)

        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.ResultSetReturnImpl.extract(ResultSetReturnImpl.java:56)
        ... 43 more
{code}

The error is due to attempting an instance state transition for zero instances. This does not appear to cause any functionality issues.
fields.summary: Auto scaling error logged when terminating instances

comments.body: We should check that this does not show up in error logs during 4.2.2 testing.
Verified that this error no longer occurs when terminating an instance.
